posts.post_title: FS: The Photographic Cards of Goodwin & CO Book SOLD
posts.post_content:
This book by Jay Miller, Joe Gonsowski and Richard Masson is in awesome unread condition (I never read it as I found my original copy with my notes in it). Has the Dust cover. Great condition. Will send by Priority Mail for $Sold PayPal gift (otherwise add 3%).

First one to PM or email me gets it.
